title: Nearly 65% of self-employed women in Indian metros have not taken a business loan, shows survey
description: 65% of self-employed women in Indian metros have not taken business loans, with 39% relying on personal savings. A DBS Bank India and CRISIL report highlights that they often use personal assets as collateral. Nearly 73% prefer digital payments and 52% have adopted sustainability policies. A DBS Foundation training program aims to boost financial literacy.
